summary: Just a few new and colorful textures for the original Blanket Scarf mod.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
---------------
This adds a few colorful textures for the original Blanket Scarf mod.
They come in 2 packages. You can either use one package, or mix and match as you like.


Requirements:
-------------------
The original mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77614]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77614[/url]


Install:
---------
Use the modmanager of your choice or manually extract the files into your Skyrim directory.


Uninstall:
------------
Delete 'blanketscarf' folder in Skyrim\data\textures


Mixing textures:
--------------------
The dds files in each pack are named 0-9. Each number represents the scarf with the same number ingame. So if you want to change the texture for scarf 5 ingame, find (or if it isn't there) create the folder 'blanketscarf' in your textures folder, rename the desired texture to '5' and put it inside the folder. Overwrite if asked.  
The Default numbers of the textures are written on the package overview pictures for easier picking, in case you can't open a dds file on your computer.


Permissions:
----------------
Do not upload this to any other site. If you want to use the textures for anything else, feel free to do so.
author: Kuschel-Drow
